#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define inf (10000007)
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define ppi pair<pii,int>
#define ppp pair<pii,pii>
#define ll long long 
#define pb push_back
#define vi vector<int>
#define vii vector< vector<int> >
#define mp make_pair

int empty,full,weight;
int p[502],w[502];
int n;
int dp[10002];

int knapsack(int wt){

	if(dp[wt]!=inf) return dp[wt];

	if(wt==0)
		return dp[wt]=0;

	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		if(w[i]>wt) continue;
		else
		 dp[wt]=min(dp[wt],knapsack(wt-w[i])+p[i]);

	}
	return dp[wt];
}


int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		for(int i=0;i<10002;i++) dp[i]=inf;
		scanf("%d %d",&empty,&full);
		weight = full-empty;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			scanf("%d %d",&p[i],&w[i]);
		}

		int y = knapsack(weight);
		if(y==inf)
			printf("This is impossible.\n");
		else
			printf("The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is %d.\n",y);

	}
    
    return 0;
}
